00113 
00114 template <typename T>
00115 inline StatusCode XmlHelper::ReadValue(const TiXmlHandle &xmlHandle, const std::string &xmlElementName, T &t)
00116 {
00117     const TiXmlElement *const pXmlElement = xmlHandle.FirstChild(xmlElementName).Element();
00118 
00119     if (NULL == pXmlElement)
00120         return STATUS_CODE_NOT_FOUND;
00121 
00122     if (!StringToType(pXmlElement->GetText(), t))
00123         return STATUS_CODE_FAILURE;
00124 
00125     return STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS;
00126 }
00127 
00128 template <>
00129 inline StatusCode XmlHelper::ReadValue<bool>(const TiXmlHandle &xmlHandle, const std::string &xmlElementName, bool &t)
00130 {
00131     const TiXmlElement *const pXmlElement = xmlHandle.FirstChild(xmlElementName).Element();
00132 
00133     if (NULL == pXmlElement)
00134         return STATUS_CODE_NOT_FOUND;
00135 
00136     const std::string xmlElementString = pXmlElement->GetText();
00137 
00138     if ((xmlElementString == "1") || (xmlElementString == "true"))
00139     {
00140         t = true;
00141     }
00142     else if ((xmlElementString == "0") || (xmlElementString == "false"))
00143     {
00144         t = false;
00145     }
00146     else
00147     {
00148         return STATUS_CODE_FAILURE;
00149     }
00150 
00151     return STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS;
00152 }

00155 
00156 template <typename T>
00157 inline StatusCode XmlHelper::ReadVectorOfValues(const TiXmlHandle &xmlHandle, const std::string &xmlElementName, std::vector<T> &vector)
00158 {
00159     const TiXmlElement *const pXmlElement = xmlHandle.FirstChild(xmlElementName).Element();
00160 
00161     if (NULL == pXmlElement)
00162         return STATUS_CODE_NOT_FOUND;
00163 
00164     StringVector tokens;
00165     TokenizeString(pXmlElement->GetText(), tokens);
00166 
00167     for (StringVector::const_iterator iter = tokens.begin(), iterEnd = tokens.end(); iter != iterEnd; ++iter)
00168     {
00169         T t;
00170 
00171         if (!StringToType(*iter, t))
00172             return STATUS_CODE_FAILURE;
00173 
00174         vector.push_back(t);
00175     }
00176 
00177     return STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS;
00178 }

00180 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00181 
00182 template <typename T>
00183 inline StatusCode XmlHelper::Read2DVectorOfValues(const TiXmlHandle &xmlHandle, const std::string &xmlElementName, const std::string &rowName,
00184     std::vector< std::vector<T> > &vector)
00185 {
00186     TiXmlElement *pXmlElement = xmlHandle.FirstChild(xmlElementName).Element();
00187 
00188     if (NULL == pXmlElement)
00189         return STATUS_CODE_NOT_FOUND;
00190 
00191     TiXmlElement *pXmlRowElement = TiXmlHandle(pXmlElement).FirstChild(rowName).Element();
00192 
00193     if (NULL == pXmlRowElement)
00194         return STATUS_CODE_NOT_FOUND;
00195 
00196     for ( ; NULL != pXmlRowElement; pXmlRowElement = pXmlRowElement->NextSiblingElement(rowName))
00197     {
00198         std::vector<T> rowVector;
00199 
00200         StringVector tokens;
00201         TokenizeString(pXmlRowElement->GetText(), tokens);
00202 
00203         for (StringVector::const_iterator iter = tokens.begin(), iterEnd = tokens.end(); iter != iterEnd; ++iter)
00204         {
00205             T t;
00206 
00207             if (!StringToType(*iter, t))
00208                 return STATUS_CODE_FAILURE;
00209 
00210             rowVector.push_back(t);
00211         }
00212 
00213         vector.push_back(rowVector);
00214     }
00215 
00216     return STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS;
00217 }
